arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Preston as Jerry Yates rescues Rams in dismal Deepdale clash
arts.sum: Jerry Yates rescued a point for Derby County as they came from behind to draw 1-1 at Preston North End in a dismal game at Deepdale. Liam Thompson then went close when his cross to the near post was nearly diverted in as Derby attempted to find a second goal.
